name: To Their Dark Wintry Bed
description:
This is a short 30-45 minutes interpersonal drama set in a survival situation. This was done for NaNoRenO 2021. 

The game is still in early access. Need to clean it up a bit. Also planning on doing more with sound design, custom GUI,  adding writing,  adding our own sprites, etc.

Please let me know what you think! :) 

This game has strong language, isolation, and arguments possibly bad for people experiencing relationship problems in quarantine.

Credits:

Written and made by Stolen Pebble Games

Sprites by Suetemo (https://itch.io/profile/sutemo)

Sound from Freesound.org: 

  • Whistling Antarctic by Stormpetrel
  • Jass Background Music by migfus20
  • room-tone-small-log-cabin by KyleS
  • Church Door by seca-studioc
  • Door Knocking Angry by Macif
  • Sci Fi Survival Dreamscape by onderwish
  • The Buzzer by e-vice
